about_the_game:
"Forgotten Depths" is a gripping psychological horror survival game that takes you deep into an abandoned mine. As the player, you step into the role of an engineer called to the mine after mysterious incidents, only to find yourself trapped in a nightmarish scenario. Stalked by supernatural threats and plagued by psychological hallucinations, you must fight for survival and your sanity.

  • Key Features:

  • Psychological Horror: Experience intense tension and fear as the Echo of the mine distorts your perception and sanity. Hallucinations and psychological pressure will constantly make you doubt reality.

  • Survival Mechanics: Manage resources like flashlight improvements and lantern oil as you search for supplies in the darkness and return safely to camp zones to recover.

  • Dynamic Darkness: Darkness is your greatest enemy. Without light, your stress level rises quickly, and supernatural forces begin to hunt you. Keep your flashlight charged and maintain the camp light to survive.

  • Cooperative Gameplay: Play alone or with a friend in co-op mode. Work together to escape the dangers of the mine and destroy the roots of the Echo.

  • Atmospheric Exploration: The sprawling, branching mine offers numerous secrets and puzzles to uncover. Discover hidden documents that reveal the dark history of the mine as you delve deeper into its forgotten depths.

  • Supernatural Threats: The mine is haunted by ghostly apparitions and supernatural entities. Fleeing and hiding are your best strategies for survival, as direct confrontation often ends in death.

  • Additional Features:

  • Multiple Endings: Your choices and survival affect how the story concludes. Experience different possible endings depending on how you face the challenges.

  • Stress-Level Mechanic: Don’t succumb to madness! Your stress level affects your perception – the higher the stress, the more distorted reality becomes. Keep your sanity in check by reaching safe camps and recovering.

  • Radio Interactions: Communicate with the outside world via radio, but be careful – the Echo can use these channels to deceive you.

content_descriptors.notes:
"Forgotten Depths" contains intense horror elements that may be disturbing to more sensitive players. These include:

- Psychological Horror: The game offers a dark atmosphere and threatening scenes that rely heavily on psychological pressure. Players are confronted with themes such as madness, isolation, and hallucinations, triggered by a steady loss of mental stability.

- Depictions of Violence: Supernatural enemies attack the player and can use deadly force. There are bloody scenes and brutal assaults on the player character as well as other figures in the game.

- Dark Themes: The storyline and atmosphere are consistently grim, dealing with themes such as fear of death, loss of mental stability, and the struggle for survival in extremely threatening situations.

- Emotional Distress: The protagonist’s psychological and emotional state deteriorates over the course of the game, depicted through visual and auditory hallucinations.

No sexual content, drug, or alcohol abuse is depicted. However, due to its intense horror themes and violent content, the game is not suitable for younger or sensitive players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11(64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 (8 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Game will run smooth on lowest/medium settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11(64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-9900K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT (10–12 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for highest Resolution and raytracing

short_description: "Forgotten Depths" is a thrilling psychological horror survival game where you fight to survive deep within a dark, abandoned mine. Battle your fear, keep your flashlight alive, and escape terrifying supernatural threats that push you closer to the brink of madness.
